name: mystically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the belief that there is a mysterious, hidden meaning in life, or that each human being can unite with God: They believed that music had a mystically potent, invisible force. His account of the story was full of mystically significant details.
More examplesFewer examplesShe believed that the crystal would mystically protect her from misfortune.The pyramid was considered to be a mystically powerful space.He was a keen reader and a mystically inclined man.Ancient people believed that bees mystically created honey.The text describes a man progressing mystically towards a final goal.
